price: Elif, Lâm, Râ. İşte bunlar kitabın, apaçık Kur'an'ın ayetleridir.
arabic: الٓرۚ تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَقُرۡءَانٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: alif-lam-ra til'ka āyātu al-kitābi waqur'ānin mubīnin
